job_description:
• Minimum Qualifications4+ years of software engineering experienceProficiency in one of C/C++, Obj-C, SwiftStrong knowledge of OS architecture, and low-level system components.
• Passion for software architecture, APIs, and high performance extensible softwareExcellent communication skillsCreative, collaborative, and product-focusedSolid understanding of Linux or Apple OS system programming, including process management, IPC, signals, and daemon lifecycle.
• Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or equivalent experience.
